item.title: towards lettre 1.0
item.description: what is lettre? lettre provides an email client for Rust programs, to allow easily sending emails from Rust applications with the following focuses: ease of use, without particular knowledge about email secure by default modern (support for full internationalization) non-goals: implementing email RFCs extensively. The goal is to target a modern and safe subset needed to send emails today, with a nice API (i.e. UTF-8 only, etc.). Particularly, lettre currently cannot parse emails.
